nodes.text: Ganjira Rell was a female leader in the Strus clan on Jakku during the Cold War. Rell favored the use of a high-powered blaster rifle at the time when the Strus clan came into contact with a group of nomads over the Starlight Wanderer. The clan was defeated in the encounter by a group of spacers assisting the nomads.
Ganjira Rell appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game adventure A Call for Heroes.
